Title: Beware, U.S. govt doesn’t want you in 2027, Apostle Ayodele tells Tinubu
Summary: Primate Elijah Ayodele has urged President Bola Tinubu to remain vigilant . His warning comes after growing tensions between Nigeria and the United States over reported attacks on Christians .

Title: OPEC+ looks set to further hike oil output
Summary: Saudi Arabia, Russia and six other key members of the OPEC+ alliance are expected to agree to further hike oil production in a virtual meeting Sunday . The group continues to seek greater market share . Analysts predict a slight output increase .

Title: Tinubu, Trump to meet over alleged Christian killings in Nigeria — Bwala
Summary: Presidential aide Daniel Bwala says President Bola Tinubu and United States President Donald Trump are expected to meet soon to address recent claims of Christian genocide in Nigeria .

Title: Expert advocates renewed tactics, regulations to curb terrorism funding in Africa
Summary: Expert advocates renewed tactics, regulations to curb terrorism funding in Africa . Security experts advocate for renewed legislative framework and stronger synergy among African countries . They want to block sources of illegal financial flows on the continent .

Title: Obama campaigns with US Democrats ahead of key state elections
Summary: Former US president Barack Obama hit the campaign trail Saturday for fellow Democrats ahead of closely-watched state elections . Obama laid into Donald Trump over his “shambolic” policies and warning of the dangers facing American democracy .

Title: Genocide against Christians: Trump, Tinubu to meet soon – Presidency
Summary: President Bola Tinubu and the American President, Donald Trump, may soon hold a diplomatic meeting over issues raised by Trump regarding the alleged genocide against Christians in Nigeria .

Title: NRC confirms Agbor train derailment, says all passengers safe
Summary: NRC confirms Warri–Itakpe passenger train derailment near Agbor . NRC says no passenger was injured in the derailment . The Nigerian Railway Corporation says all passengers are safe .

Title: 15% duty on petroleum products will protect local refineries, attract investors — Osatuyi
Summary: Mike Osatuyi commended President Bola Tinubu for approving 15% import duty on petrol and diesel . Osatu said that the policy would protect local refineries and attract new investors .

Title: Tinubu to meet Trump over alleged Christian Genocide in Nigeria – Presidency
Summary: Tinubu will meet with his U.S. counterpart, Donald Trump, in the coming days to discuss allegations of a Christian genocide in Nigeria, the Presidency has said . The Presidency said the meeting will take place in the next few days .

Title: How we invest employees’ contributions — NSITF
Summary: Nigeria Social Insurance Trust Fund (NSITF) says its investment philosophy is anchored on prudence, transparency, and low-risk options . Managing Director of the Fund, Mr Oluwaseun Faleye, disclosed this in an interview with Newsmen on Sunday .

Title: Kaduna now one family, Uba Sani hails mass defections to APC
Summary: Kaduna State Governor, Uba Sani, has said his leadership style has continued to attract defectors to the All Progressives Congress . Senator Sunday Katung, representing Southern Kaduna, and three other legislators formally defected to the APC during a mega rally on Saturday . Sani made this known at the Kafanchan Township

Title: SERAP sues Senate President, Speaker over ₦3m bribe-for-bills claim
Summary: The Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project said it has filed a lawsuit against the President of the Senate, Godswill Akpabio, and Speaker of the House of Representatives, Tajudeen Abbas, over their alleged failure to investigate claims that lawmakers pay up to ₦3 million to sponsor or present bills, motions

Title: Warri-Itakpe train derails, NRC suspends service
Summary: The Nigeria Railway Corporation has announced the derailment of the Warri-Itakpe train . This occurred exactly four days after service resumed on the same route . The NRC had suspended the service since August 2, due to a series of breakdowns and other technical glitches .

Title: Police arrest Lagos taxi driver over serial rape, assault
Summary: Lagos State Criminal Investigation Department (SCID), Panti, have arrested a commercial taxi driver, Adedayo Adegbola, in connection with multiple cases of rape, assault, and armed robbery . The arrest followed viral online posts in which several victims identified the suspect’s picture as that of the man who allegedly assaulted

Title: I love you today, tomorrow and always, Davido gushes over wife, Chioma
Summary: Davido penned a heartfelt note and sent a bouquet of flowers to his wife, Chioma Adeleke . The couple welcomed twins in 2023 and officially tied the knot in a $3.7m Miami star-studded wedding ceremony earlier this year . Davido is currently on tour in Nigeria and has performed in Ak
